product.title: Feledorashia Hair Styler & Dryer Brush - Ionic Ceramic Round Brush with Ergonomic Handle for Voluminous, Frizz-Free Shine - Multifunctional for Straightening, Curling & Smoothing - Salon Blow-Dry at Home
product.title_excluding_brand: Hair Styler & Dryer Brush - Ionic Ceramic Round Brush with Ergonomic Handle for Voluminous, Frizz-Free Shine - Multifunctional for Straightening, Curling & Smoothing - Salon Blow-Dry at Home
product.description:
Hair Styler & Dryer Brush - Ionic Ceramic Round Brush with Ergonomic Handle for Voluminous, Frizz-Free Shine - Multifunctional for Straightening, Curling & Smoothing - Salon Blow-Dry at Home
Features:
1-Step Hair Styler With powerful combination of round brush and hair dryer tool, this can effectively dry and style your hair at once, giving you voluminous and frizz- shining in one step.
Multifunctional Hair Styling Brush Straighten, dry, curls, style, smooths and add dramatic volume and shining to your hair and get long lasting curls without hair products. The oval shaped brush keeps hair from getting tangles and the round edges help add volume to hair.
Safe Ergonomic Natural soft bristles for ultimate smoothness to avoid frizz and damage. Ionic ceramic coating technologies to give regulated temperature and avoid your hair and scalp from hurting. Ergonomic handle is designed for maximum and ease of use during styling. This product features fluffys/straight hair/hair dryer function
Salon--Blow-Dry at Home No need for trip to the salon anymore, saves you lot of and money. This can be used for party, work and travel, suitable for men women and whole family. Become fashionista anytime, anywhere.
Product Description:
Constant temperature control does not hurt the hair.The internal heating is made of material.When the temperature reaches the perm temperature,it can R stabilized automatically. Antiscalding comb,the proper spacing BRtween the comb teeth and the conductor,the rod body reaches the molding temperature when in use,and the comb tip is at temperature,so there is no need to worry about burns. Straight-volume-in-1 instant With it,you will have both curling and hair straightener.It makes the shape simples and convenient.
Product Description:1*Hair Curler Straightener
Rated voltage: 110V
Rated frequency：60HZ
Rated power: 25W
Length：19 cm/7.48inch (Not included power cord)
